author: antelder
msg: Automatically start a JMS broker when using the JMS based binding.sca. The broker uses multicast discovery so other SCA nodes get automatically discovered

author: antelder
msg: Don't crash with an exception if an embedded broker is closed before stop is called on a JMS service

author: xavier
msg: IMPROVEMENT: write home page, description and license info in XmlModuleDescriptorWriter. This is useful to be sure we don't lose information parsed in poms, license information being especially useful (related to IVY-892)

author: woonsan
msg: Modified the existing classes to implement new interfaces.
Build is still broken. Manager components and some serialization tools need to be refined more.

author: hibou
msg: Add the docuemntation about how to update the IvyDE updatesite
